item.description:
Hola Amigos:

Let's Salsa at Habana Club in Cambridge! The perfect place to take some Salsa classes, meet new people, practice our Spanish, and party all night long. From 9pm-10:00pm is the Salsa lesson, followed by dancing with everyone else for the rest of the evening. All levels of Spanish are welcomed! You can read more about this venue here.

Come ready to rotate and talk to as many people as you can. We are all friendly and eager to get to know you. This is a very informal gathering. It will provide all of us with the opportunity to practice speaking Spanish in a real setting and get somewhat more acquainted to the Latino culture. Remember our objective is having fun while we are speaking Spanish

This is an event sponsored by SpanishBlackBelt. No meetup fee will be charged but there is a $12 cover charge at the door for the dance club fee/Salsa lesson--the lesson is a little fast-paced but informative, the students rotate dance-partners throughout (great for getting to meet new people), and the lesson is taught by very nice instructors.

Please RSVP if you are planning on coming. Hasta muy pronto !!!

If instead, or in addition, you want to attend one of our regular Spanish classes, please click here to access all Small Group sessions currently being offered by Spanish Black Belt.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup badge and a big smile!
item.name: Add some Salsa to your Spanish this coming Saturday!
